modifyUserStatus

public void modifyUserStatus(User user)
Description copied from interface: AgencyUserManager
allows the users active/inactive flag to be altered and the action to be audited. If the user passed to the method is currently active, the user will be made inactive. If the user passed to the method is inactive, the user will be made active.

Specified by:
modifyUserStatus in interface AgencyUserManager
Parameters:
user - the User object to operate on
